projects.name: Tickets
projects.description: Tickets is a web application that enables users to manage their bank accounts in a secure and digital manner. The app offers features such as automated operations, analytics, AI capabilities, and the ability to import transactions by capturing images of shopping receipts, bills, and more. With thousands of users, the app continues to grow, and new features and fixes are implemented daily. For more information, visit the Tickets website.

projects.name: Freezer
projects.description: Freezer is a native IOS applications that helps users find free parking near their location using an AI-powered algorithm. The application is currently in beta. If you'd like to try it, please send an email.

projects.name: LucTst CLI
projects.description: A command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline the creation of Node.js module projects. I developed this tool to efficiently manage the common boilerplate structures I encounter while working on numerous open-source projects. More info here

projects.name: Fast Repo
projects.description: Efficiently manage and interact with your GitHub repository using a variety of quick actions designed to streamline your workflow. More info here

projects.name: Get Good Readme.md
projects.description: Get Good Readme is a command-line tool build with NodeJs created in 2020 designed to generate README.md files using a selection of templates. More info here

experiences.name: Localista
experiences.description: I have been collaborating with Localista on a four-month mission focused on optimizing and resolving issues within their web application. This project involves enhancing user experience, improving performance, and ensuring the platform's reliability and efficiency.

experiences.name: BIM Cloissons
experiences.description: As part of my freelance journey, I have been engaged for a short-term project with BIM Cloissons, a company that operates a SaaS platform within the building industry.

experiences.name: Prestashop
experiences.description: As a full-stack developer, I was part of one of the 'modules' teams at PrestaShop. My role involved creating plugins and modules that integrate into the user's back office. This included the Metrics module for collecting e-commerce site data, the Legal module, and the Shipping module.

experiences.name: Mentoring Openclassrooms
experiences.description: Since the beginning of 2021, I have been mentoring students on their web development journey through OpenClassrooms, and I continue to do so to this day.

experiences.name: Bluecoders
experiences.description: I worked as a Full Stack JavaScript Developer on an internal Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system utilized by various sales teams. My role involved both front-end and back-end development, ensuring seamless integration and functionality across the platform to enhance the efficiency and productivity of the sales personnel. I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to implement user-friendly features and optimize the system's performance.

experiences.name: Moonshot Insurance(previously Internet)
experiences.description: I worked as a full stack software engineer at Moonshot Insurance for a year, using Vue.js for front-end development and Python for back-end development, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. More info here

experiences.name: Learning Software Engineering
experiences.description: During the first three years of my master's program, I gained diverse experience in web development, I worked both in Startup and as a freelancer, in France and internationally(New-York, South Africa).
